page.title: 17RELIGION - THREE MOSSES.
page.content: In the main this area is Church of England. Those who attend the church services on Sunday or other festivals do so at St. Cuthbert's Church in Halsall village or St. Thomas's Church at Lydiate. Children attending junior school go either to the village school in Haskayne or to the church school of Halsall. The few Catholic families in the area attend St. Mary's Church in Lydiate, this being the nearest to Haskayne. Or those who live in the northern section of this area, to St. Elizabeth's church in Scarisbrick, or St.Anne's in Ormskirk. The catholic children usually attend Our Lady's R.C.school in Lydiate. These are the only religions mentioned in this area.
